title: Notification will not turn off
content:
After turn off the notifications, itÂ´s turn on after a while. For example, I receive a lot of messages from WhatsApp groups, so, I went to settings and WhatsApp notifications, and turn off the group notifications.
When someone in any group sand any message it turns on the group notifications. It happens with any other app.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
